TopicTitle: China have created a space 3d printer

Articles.Content:
It seems 3d printing is advancing at an incredible scale not matter what part of the world your in (apart from the DPRK ).

Anyway the Chinese now also have a space based 3d printer ready, it will probably go up on the mir class but could be delivered to T-2 by a tianzhou

You get a 3d printer

and you get a 3d printer

everybody gets a 3d printer
Now they can print themselves a Chinese counterpart of anything, anywhere. Seems to be a logical extension of their manufacturing capabilities on Earth.
